chara.textHome: My name's Kirika Kure.

I'll do you a favor...and tell you
just how wonderful Oriko is.

She pulled me out of the jaws of darkness
that were about to consume me!

She's caring and kind...pretty much
the holy mother incarnate.
No, no, that's a good enough intro for me.
Everything I am is devoted to her.
It's all right...don't worry, Oriko.

We can look forward to whatever final
form I take when despair takes me over...

No matter how I end up,
I know I will never harm you.
There's nothing I can't overcome!
The limit of my love for her is infinite!
Ahh, Oriko!
I've become someone worthy of you!

You are the lone person in this world
worthy of my devotion!
So I won't falter for a second in my mission.
Let's head forward together, Oriko!

Hey, Oriko, how do you wanna
use my new power?

Agh, I can barely wait to hear
what orders you give me!

I can't help wanting to use it
in your honor as soon as I can...

And of course,
I'll follow your orders to the letter.
Oh, it's you.
*Sigh* It's so boring when Oriko's not here.
Do you know where she went?
Zz...
ngh... I can't seem to wake up today.

Maybe I'll wake up if I drink some tea
with a spoonful of jam in it.
Ugh, so hungry. Starving, in fact!

All right, that's it! I'm gonna eat the
best parfait in the universe with Oriko!

Don't bother me with petty stuff.
I'm only interested in info about Oriko.
My whole body...my brain...
They only exist to serve Oriko.
Have you seen Kyubey?
Oh, it's not me looking for it.
I couldn't care less myself.
Oriko was looking for him.

People who think love can be measured 
don't know what real love truly is...

My love for Oriko is so great that it
could never be quantified like that.
Don't tell me you're not ready yet!

I wanna finish things up so I can go
spend time with Oriko!
It's almost time to fight...
I'm not scared!
If it's for Oriko...
I'm totally ready for this!

Oriko's pancakes are better
than any other sweets.

She makes them for
me whenever I ask.
I bet you're jealous, huh?
What's wrong with having a sweet tooth?
Adults like sweets just as much as kids.

It's wrong to treat someone like a child 
just because they like sweets.
Have you seen the doll Oriko gave me?!
It's a rabbit!

Why do I do this to myself?
Where did I put it?!
Ack!
What's with you, all of a sudden?!

I'm telling you now, I won't let 
you lay a finger on Oriko!
It doesn't matter how much we talk.

I'll have forgotten all about 
you next time we meet...
I don't care about anyone except Oriko.
I can't drink tea without sugar.

My tea always needs three sugar cubes 
and three spoonfuls of jam...
*Sigh*...
Oriko's gonna treat me like a kid again.

I became a Magical Girl
so I could be with Oriko.

As long as we're together,
I won't have any regrets,
no matter what despair I face.
All right, fine.

I guess I can talk to you for a bit.
I'm so bored without Oriko.
God you're persistent.

What? You're trying to interrupt 
my time with Oriko?
Seriously, learn your place.
Ready? It's showtime!
What? You're done already?
As to be expected.
Hey, that was actually kind of fun.
Don't underestimate my love.
I'm Kirika Kure.

You might've heard of the
"Dark Magical Girl", that's me.

If you raise a hand against Oriko...
I won't waste a second crushing you.
Aaah...

I can feel Oriko's love!
Her love is what spurs me on!
Don't think this is the best I have to offer.
My love for her is endless.

I feel totally rejuvenated.
I hate to be tied down by
anything other than Oriko...
My devotion to her is infinite!

A murderer, a Witch... It doesn't matter
if the rest of the world comes to despise me,
I will become anything if it's for her sake!

If you walk the path of a Magical Girl
you can't afford to hesitate,
not even for a millisecond.

I'd gladly fall into despair
if it would protect Oriko.
